original_title: Litro Gas to grant Rs. 1.5 bn as dividends to Treasury
original_body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka, a prominent supplier of Liquefied Petroleum (LP) gas in Sri Lanka, has made a significant contribution of Rs. 1.5 billion to the Treasury in the form of dividends.
This amount was transferred through their primary shareholder, Sri Lanka Insurance Corporation (SLIC).
Chairman Muditha Peiris confirmed that necessary steps are being taken to deliver the funds to the Treasury today (July 20).
